name: Forgotten Castle
storyline: Main character is not able to sleep. He feels hate against Death inside him. Death feels it and takes him as his new plaything to the Castle. And the story develops as you continue playing.
summary:
A game where you wander around in a Castle... 
Solve puzzles, kill mobs, and make quests. 
There will be 2 different chapters in the end. 
First Chapter is complete. 
Game will have tons of characters and boss fights 
i think everybody should give it a try.
